name: Okino PolyTrans|CAD+DCC

description: glTF models hosted on Sketchfab may be embedded in an iframe on any site, using the [embed models](https://help.sketchfab.com/hc/en-us/articles/203509907-Embed-Models) feature.

name: UnityGLTF
description: Unity3D library for exporting, loading, parsing, and rendering glTF assets

name: GLTFUtility
description: glTF 2.0 loader plugin for Unity3D

name: notes
description: Unreal adds glTF import capability

name: Godot Game Engine
description: Version 3.2+ has support for glTF import. Version 3.4+ has support for glTF export.

name: jMonkeyEngine
description: jME 3.2 supports glTF 2.0

name: Ogre_glTF
description: glTF 2.0 loader plugin for Ogre v2-1

description: glTF 2.0 import

name: LÖVR
description: A framework for creating VR with Lua

name: LibGDX glTF
description: [LibGDX](https://libgdx.badlogicgames.com/) library for loading and rendering glTF assets

name: RoomVolumeDirectShape
description: Revit C# .NET add-in creating DirectShape elements representing room volume, with [glTF export](https://thebuildingcoder.typepad.com/blog/2019/06/room-volume-gltf-generator.html) library for loading and rendering glTF assets

description: C++11 based glTF 2.0 data insight tool

name: Radeon Cauldron
description: A simple framework for rapid prototyping on Vulkan or Direct3D 12

name: Autodesk BIM 360
description: Construction Management Software with [glTF import](https://knowledge.autodesk.com/support/bim-360/learn-explore/caas/CloudHelp/cloudhelp/ENU/BIM360D-Document-Management/files/GUID-0E5E18BC-343A-47FC-B921-BDD1A40DA9F4-html.html)

description: Export Revit designs directly from inside Revit to GLTF and GLB files

name: USD from glTF
description: Library, command-line tool, and import plugin for converting glTF models to USD

name: The-Forge
description: The Forge is a cross-platform rendering framework, including a [glTF model viewer](https://github.com/ConfettiFX/The-Forge#8-gltf-model-viewer)

name: glTF-quicklook
description: Simple QuickLook plugin for previewing gltf-files on macOS

name: Elevation API
description: A simple open source API providing global elevation data and fast content pipeline, enabling live 3D textured terrain generation in both STL and glTF

name: glTFVariantMeld
description: An application that accepts files on the glTF format, interprets them as variants of an over-arching whole, and melds them together.

name: Datakit CrossManager
description: File converter. Supports multiple 3D formats inputs and outputs, including glTF input and output. Graphical interface or command-line

name: Datakit CrossCad/Ware SDK
description: A library to read and write glTF or glb files. Can also read and write multiple 3D formats

name: forge-convert-utils
description: Node.js library and CLI tool for converting Autodesk Forge content to glTF.

name: Esri CityEngine
description: Advanced 3D city design software supports glTF to [import](https://doc.arcgis.com/en/cityengine/latest/help/help-import-gltf.htm) and [export](https://doc.arcgis.com/en/cityengine/latest/help/help-export-gltf.htm)

name: ArcGIS Pro
description: Desktop GIS for 2D and 3D and supports usage of [glTF content](https://pro.arcgis.com/en/pro-app/help/mapping/layer-properties/gltf-markers.htm) as markers in 3D.

name: JglTF-mesh
description: Generate glTF meshes and geometry in Java

name: pygltflib
description: Python library for reading, writing and converting glTF 2.0 files.

name: Gestaltor
description: Native application for viewing, inspecting, editing, composing and optimizing glTF.

name: acl-gltf
description: Animation Compression Library glTF toolkit

name: Gru
description: glTF runtime importer for Unity3D

name: Apple Reality Converter
description: An application to convert different file formats, including glTF, to USD

name: SimpleGLTF2
description: A deserializer/loader and viewer for GLTF2 written in Java.

name: Amazon Sumerian
description: An augmented reality and virtual reality applications service with glTF export

name: Arvizio Auganix
description: A software platform for mixed reality, with glTF support

name: glTF-Transform
description: glTF 2.0 SDK for JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js

name: Model Viewer for Flutter
description: A Flutter plugin for rendering interactive 3D models in the glTF and GLB formats.

name: glTF Editor
description: glTF viewer and editor web application

name: ProtoTech glTF Exporter For Inventor
description: Export Inventor model to GLTF and GLB files

name: ProtoTech glTF Exporter For Fusion 360
description: Export Fusion 360 model to GLTF and GLB files

name: ProtoTech glTF Exporter For Revit
description: Export Revit design to GLTF and GLB files

description: Export SolidEdge model to GLTF and GLB files

description: Export Solidworks model to GLTF and GLB files

name: F3D
description: A fast and minimalist 3D viewer

name: Cesium for Unreal
description: A plugin for the Unreal Engine that allows streaming assets from the cloud, using the 3D Tiles format that is based on glTF.

name: Cesium Native
description: A base library for 3D geospatial applications, including lightweight glTF serialization and deserialization.

name: CesiumJS
description: A library for creating geospatial web applications that can load and visualize glTF assets in a geospatial context.

name: Cesium ion
description: A platform for hosting, optimizing, and streaming massive amounts of geospatial data. It can import glTF and other file formats, and convert them into the 3D Tiles format for efficient streaming and rendering.

name: gltf-pipeline
description: A content pipeline for converting, optmizing, and compressing glTF assets

name: gltf-codec
description: Haskell library for loading glTF 2.0 files in JSON and binary formats.

name: Unreal4Web
description: A plugin that exports 3D models from the Unreal Engine as glTF assets

name: Zea Engine glTF loader
description: The glTF loader enables loading of glTF, glTF Binary, and glTF Draco files into Zea Engine.

name: Unreal Datasmith
description: Workflow tools to import data in various formats, including glTF, into Unreal Engine.

name: Unreal glTF Exporter
description: An Unreal Editor plugin that allows exporting selected actors, selected assets or a full level into glTF files.

name: NVIDIA DesignWorks vk_raytrace sample
description: A glTF 2.0 sample viewer using Vulkan ray tracing, using tinygltf to load glTF 2.0 assets

name: NVIDIA Omniverse
description: [USD Composer](https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/omniverse/apps/create/) is an NVIDIA Omniverse foundation application for large scale world building and scene composition. With plug-ins it can [interoperate with other applications](https://docs.omniverse.nvidia.com/connect/latest/connecting-to-omniverse.html).

name: Emersya
description: Authoring Platform for online 3D & AR product visualization, customization and collaborative product development

name: Spark AR Studio
description: A tool for creating interactive augmented reality projects, that allows integrating glTF assets directly from [Sketchfab](https://sketchfab.com/)

name: Asobo Studio - Microsoft Flight Simulator glTF Exporter for 3ds Max
description: A fork of the BabylonJS 3ds Max exporter that exports glTF assets for the Microsoft Flight Simulator, using materials that are based on the Asobo glTF extensions

name: Blender2MSFS toolkit
description: A Blender addon for creating glTF assets for the Microsoft Flight Simulator

name: Poimandres Market
description: A repository of free, ready-to-use low-poly public-domain glTF models

name: Nomad Sculpt
description: A sculpting and painting mobile application with glTF import and export

name: Spiraloid 3D Comic Toolkit for Blender
description: A Blender addon for creating 3D comics, where each scene is a glTF asset

name: ReadyPlayerMe
description: A customizable avatar creator for games and VR, with glTF export. Offers integrations for web applications, as well as plugins for Unity and Unreal.

name: V-Ray glTF viewer
description: A set of Python scripts for the V-Ray App SDK for parsing and rendering glTF

name: Virtual Try-On
description: Introducing virtual try-on for rings, bracelets, and watches. Benefit from the state-of-the-art, real-time rendering of fine jewelry combining with the cutting-edge AR technology.

name: Dassault Systèmes 3DEXCITE
description:
A cloud-based marketing content creation platform with glTF export.

The glTF export was announced in https://twitter.com/bsfea/status/1397120960873078784

name: rgl2gltf
description: An R package with functions to read and write `.gltf` and `.glb` files.

name: gltf.report
description: A website that allows viewing, validating and inspecting glTF assets, analyzing their memory requirements, and exporting them with different compression settings

name: Smapshot
description: Smapshot is a web participatory platform based on citizen science which makes use of a 3D virtual globe (CesiumJS) for georeferencing landscape historical images. The development of the platform began in 2017 and is still being carried out at the University of Applied Sciences and Arts of Western Switzerland, School of Engineering and Management Vaud.

name: Pixi3D
description: The 3D renderer for PixiJS. Seamless integration with 2D applications.

name: GLTF-tool
description: A tool to view most of the data contained in a glTF file, with hyperlinks to follow the references across different sections within the file.

name: guc
description: glTF to Universal Scene Description (USD) converter with MaterialX support

name: fastgltf
description: A blazing fast C++17 glTF library powered by SIMD.

name: Minecraft MCglTF
description: A 3D model loader library for glTF models in the Minecraft Modding enviroment.

name: Siemens NX
description: A design, simulation, and manufacturing software with glTF export, as described in https://blogs.sw.siemens.com/nx-design/visualizing-the-digital-twin-enhancements-in-the-latest-nx-release/

name: migenius RealityServer
description: A platform for integrating photorealistic 3D rendering into web applications, with glTF support

name: Titania X3D Editor
description: An X3D Graphics authoring tool and browser with glTF support

name: 3ds Max Importer/Exporter
description: Import/Export glTF file plugins for 3ds Max2021 or later

name: MATLAB-GLTF
description: MATLAB class to export 3D graphs and other content to glTF.

name: Govie Editor
description: Create interactive 3D presentations - called Govies - within seconds, as easily as using PowerPoint. Convert multiple CAD formats to GLTF 2.0 and utilize them for your 3D interactions. Share the 3D presentations or embed and control them with the Govie web API. Additionally, export them as an offline Govie and view them in the Govie standalone player.

name: Needle Engine
description: Needle Engine is a web engine for complex and simple 3D applications alike. Run on your machine and deploy anywhere. It is flexible, extensible and has built-in support for **collaboration and XR**! It is built around the glTF standard for 3D assets. Powerful integrations for **Unity** and **Blender** allow artists and developers to collaborate and manage web applications inside battle-tested 3d editors. **Needle Engine Integrations** allow you to use Editor features for exporting models, author materials, animate and sequence animations, bake lightmaps and more with ease. Our powerful **compression and optimization pipeline for the web** make sure your files are ready, small and load fast!

name: Wicked Engine
description: 3D engine with modern graphics

name: ATON framework
description: ATON framework is based on modern web standards and open-source technologies to create interactive, liquid and collaborative Web3D/WebXR apps targeting Cultural Heritage field. It allows to create scalable, collaborative and cross-device 3D web-apps (mobile, desktop and immersive XR) without any installation required for final users, providing built-in tools (view, inspect, edit, annotate, measure, ...) and a modular architecture based on node.js
